description:
A sister saves her brothers, a love is found, lost, and found again, and you put an “o” in front of everything to be polite.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanawa no Hakuchou / Nazo no Koiuta / "O" wa Muzukashii
The Seven Swans / The Mysterious Love Poem / `O` Is Hard
七羽の白鳥 / 謎の恋歌 / 「お」は難しい
